alert.note: Alert for Bledsoe; Bradley; Meigs; Sequatchie (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 6:05PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN BRADLEY...EAST CENTRAL SEQUATCHIE...SOUTHWESTERN MEIGS...SOUTHWESTERN BLEDSOE AND NORTHEASTERN HAMILTON COUNTIES THROUGH 745 PM EDT/645 PM CDT/... At 705 PM EDT/605 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 7 miles east of Dunlap, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Soddy-Daisy, Sale Creek, Flat Top Mountain, Mowbray Mountain, Hopewell, Birchwood, Big Spring, Shady Grove, and North Chickamauga Creek Gorge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
